name: cinematographer
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a person who specializes in the art and methods of film photography: He is an Oscar-winning cinematographer. Her skin has an unearthly glow, which might be the work of the brilliant cinematographer. See
cinematography
More examplesFewer examplesA marine biologist and underwater cinematographer, he has collaborated on 20 documentaries on sharks.The film's emotional subtlety is visually complemented by the able cinematographer.He felt actors, directors, cinematographers, and perhaps the film itself absorbed something from where the shooting took place.
